description: My place is in Williamsburg - one of the hippest neighborhoods of NYC. Located two blocks from the L-train, you can get to Union Square in 15 mins. The house is walking distance from the best restaurants and bars, Nitehawk Cinema, waterfront with NYC skyline views, Artists & Flea Market + tons of great coffee and brunch places. You’ll love the well-lit home with a super comfy bed (+ sofa bed), and a full kitchen. Good for couples, friends, solo and business travelers, and families (with kids).
name: Sunny Williamsburg Apartment-15 min from Union Sq.
review: Shachi was an incredible host. She was helpful and kind. The apartment is beautiful and the location is great! *****
